docs.description: Execute an SQL statement

tags.description: Optional options argument

tags.title: param

tags.title: param
tags.description: A boolean value that specifies whether to execute the generated SQL statement. Defaults to false.

tags.title: param
tags.description: (Optional) callback function

docs.description: Insert or update a record based on a logical condition using ON CONFLICT UPDATE

tags.title: example
tags.description:
upsertIf(
  dataValue('name'),
  'users', // the DB table
  'ON CONSTRAINT users_pkey', // a DB column with a unique constraint OR a CONSTRAINT NAME
  { name: 'Elodie', id: 7 },
  { writeSql:true, execute: true }
)

tags.title: param
tags.description: a data to check existing value for.
tags.name: logical

tags.title: param
tags.description: The target table
tags.name: table

tags.title: param
tags.description: The uuid column to determine a matching/existing record
tags.name: uuid

tags.title: param
tags.description: Payload data for the record as a JS object or function
tags.name: record

tags.title: param
tags.description: Optional options argument
tags.name: options

tags.description: A string value that specifies the behavior for inserting null values.
tags.name: options.setNull

tags.description: A boolean value that specifies whether to log the generated SQL statement. Defaults to false.
tags.name: options.writeSql

tags.title: param
tags.description: A boolean value that specifies whether to execute the generated SQL statement. Defaults to false.

tags.description: A boolean value that specifies whether to log the inserted values to the console. Defaults to false.

docs.description:
Picks out a single value from source data.
If a JSONPath returns more than one value for the reference, the first
item will be returned.

tags.title: example
tags.description: sourceValue('$.key')

tags.title: param
tags.description: JSONPath referencing a point in `state`.
tags.name: path

docs.description: Ensures a path points at the data.

tags.title: example
tags.description: dataPath('key')

tags.title: param
tags.description: JSONPath referencing a point in `data`.
tags.name: path

docs.description:
Picks out a single value from the source data objectâ€”usually `state.data`.
If a JSONPath returns more than one value for the reference, the first
item will be returned.

tags.title: example
tags.description: dataValue('key')

tags.title: param
tags.description: JSONPath referencing a point in `data`.
tags.name: path

docs.description: Picks out the last reference value from source data.

tags.title: example
tags.description: lastReferenceValue('key')

tags.title: param
tags.description: JSONPath referencing a point in `references`.
tags.name: path

docs.description:
Iterates over an array of items and invokes an operation upon each one, where the state
object is _scoped_ so that state.data is the item under iteration.
The rest of the state object is untouched and can be referenced as usual.
You can pass an array directly, or use lazy state or a JSONPath string to
reference a slice of state.

tags.title: example
tags.caption: Using lazy state ($) to iterate over items in state.data and pass each into an "insert" operation

tags.title: example
tags.caption: Iterate over items in state.data and pass each one into an "insert" operation

tags.title: example
tags.caption: Using JSON path to iterate over items in state.data and pass each one into an "insert" operation

tags.title: param
tags.description: JSONPath referencing a point in `state`.
tags.name: dataSource

tags.title: param
tags.description: The operation needed to be repeated.
tags.name: operation

docs.description: Combines two operations into one

tags.title: example
tags.description:
combine(
  create('foo'),
  delete('bar')
)

tags.title: param
tags.description: Operations to be performed.
tags.name: operations

docs.description: Run an operation and save the result to a custom key in state instead of overwriting state.data.

tags.title: example
tags.description: as('cceData', collections.get('cce-data-dhis2', { key: `*:*:${$.syncedAt}*` }));
tags.caption: Fetch cce-data from collections and store them under state.cceData

tags.title: param
tags.description: The state key to assign the result of the operation to.
tags.name: key

tags.title: param
tags.description: An operation that returns a new state object with a `data` property
tags.name: operation
